com.milowski.hmm
Class Model

java.lang.Object
  com.milowski.hmm.Model

public class Model
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a HMM model. It provides the basis to manipulate the alphabet, states, transitions and emission probabilities.

Nested Class Summary
static interface Model.Translator
          A translator for each character of the alphabet into a character code.

Constructor Detail

Model

public Model(java.lang.String name,
             int alphabetSize,
             int numberOfStates,
             double error)
Constructs a model with a default number of states.

Parameters:
name - The name of the HMM.
alphabetSize - The alphabet size.
numberOfStates - The number of states.
error - The precision of the model (for training purposes).

generateSequence

public int[][] generateSequence(int length)
Generates a sequence of rolls from the model with the states of used to emit each roll.

Parameters:
length - The length of the sequence to generate.
Returns:
A double array of integers where the first array is the sequence of rolls and the second array is the states used to generate the rolls.
